description: Experts say the risk of transmission is higher because droplets are projected when exhaling smoke.
title: Coronavirus: Spanish regions ban smoking over Covid-19 risk
title_page: Coronavirus: Spanish regions ban smoking over Covid-19 risk - BBC News
maintext: It also said smokers risked infection in other ways, such as by touching their cigarette before bringing it to their mouth and by handling face masks when taking them on and off.
